DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this phase II study is to assess the efficacy of combined chemotherapy using gemcitabine and cetuximab for advanced cholangiocarcinoma, excluding gallbladder cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Gemcitabine and Cetuximab in Patients With Advanced or Metastatic Biliary Tract Cancer: A Multicenter Phase II Study
